head.title: number-no-trailing-zeros
head.description: number-no-trailing-zeros Disallow trailing zeros in numbers. Options true The following patterns are considered warnings: The following…

body:
#number-no-trailing-zeros

Disallow trailing zeros in numbers.

a { top: 0.5000px; bottom: 1.0px; }
/**         ↑                ↑
 *        These trailing zeros */

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { top: 1.0px }
a { top: 1.01000px }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { top: 1px }
a { top: 1.01px }
rawBody:
# number-no-trailing-zeros

Disallow trailing zeros in numbers.

```css
a { top: 0.5000px; bottom: 1.0px; }
/**         ↑                ↑
 *        These trailing zeros */
```

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { top: 1.0px }
```

```css
a { top: 1.01000px }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { top: 1px }
```

```css
a { top: 1.01px }
```
raw:
---
title: number-no-trailing-zeros
---

# number-no-trailing-zeros

Disallow trailing zeros in numbers.

```css
a { top: 0.5000px; bottom: 1.0px; }
/**         ↑                ↑
 *        These trailing zeros */
```

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { top: 1.0px }
```

```css
a { top: 1.01000px }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { top: 1px }
```

```css
a { top: 1.01px }
```
